settings.text: If you’re looking to replace your Ford Car Mats, or you want to make your make your Ford interior stand out from the crowd? Then, Official Car Mats are sure to have the perfect options for you, and better still at exceptional value for top quality mats manufactured by us, right here in the UK.

settings.heading: order your custom car mats to fit your ford today

settings.text:
Order a set of custom Ford car mats today from Official Car Mats, the UK’s market leader for over 30 years. They will be tailored and designed to match the colour scheme of your choice or can be personalised to your heart’s content to fit your unique style and exact vehicle requirements.

Rubber or granular backing, which we use in all of our mats, along with the compatible securing clips for each car, ensure the car mats stay safe and stay put while driving.

Every product from Official Car Mats is created to ensure a perfect match to the original parts, using precision design and cutting. These Ford car mats will not only look great inside your car, but will also protect it from damage, stains, rot and dirt. Our OEM-matching securing systems make our car mats easy to install and remove, while also being easy to clean. Official Car Mats products keep your interior clean and damage-free for longer!

With free UK delivery, they are the perfect gift for any Ford owner, our mats are sure to look fantastic and stand the test of time. They are created with the purpose of being strong, high quality and long-lasting. From rubber to plush wool, find a mat that fits you as perfectly as it fits your car.

Our Ford car mats are designed with quality in mind, and are available in a range of colours and trim options. You can add a logo or your name to the design by selecting a font and entering your text. You can also choose from among a range of football club badges!

Official Car Mats is a British manufacturer of car floor mats, boot mats and liners.
